```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
# let's generate some numbers first
myNumbers <- c(1, 2, 3, 2, 5, 6, 9 , 18, 11, 3, 4, 6, 7)
```
```{r}
# length of numbers
length(myNumbers)

```

```{r}
# find mean
mean(myNumbers)
```

```{r}
# find median
median(myNumbers)
```
